advancements.adventure.summon_amethyst_g: Summon an Amethyst Golem and listen to its song
intarsia.page.typeequals: Returns True if both argumens have the same type. Otherwise, returns false.
intarsia.page.calculate_media: Returns the amount of media caster has in inventory. I should remember that hexes can waste media!
intarsia.page.slot_write: Remove an iota and number from the stack, and save the iota into the item in quick-slot with the number.
intarsia.page.slot_read: Remove the top number, copy the iota from item in quick-slot with the number, and add it to the stack.
intarsia.page.sending.1: Quite similar to $(l:patterns/great_spells/teleport#hexcasting:teleport)$(action)Greater Teleport/$, but limited to items, and only those I hold at that!
intarsia.page.sending.2: It can, however, insert items into inventories. Any excess items will be thrown on the ground, with bit of momentum. It appears that it is unable to transport shulker boxes and similar items, sending their contents instead. Costs about one $(l:items/amethyst)$(item)Charged Amethyst/$ for each stack of items sent
hexcasting.mishap.no_slot: %s needs a valid slot number to operate on but got %s
